titles.title: Monster Strike The Animation
モンスターストライク The Animation
Monster Strike the Animation

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: DESCRIPTION MISSING
tag.description: The description for this entry is missing. e.g plot, biography... Please help by adding it, and remove this tag afterwards. Thank you.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.

episode.title: 闇への序章
Prelude to Darkness
Yami e no Joshou
episode.summary: - Is this place really all that...? This heaven... - The Angelic Guard, who call the heavens their home, have been tasked with collecting the orbs scattered across the world. Lucifer—a leader of the Angelic Guard with a rebellious streak, said to wield power rivaling the Almighty—carries out her duty along with Uriel, also a leader of the guard. Together, they go about executing their mission, until... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 天界に鳴り響く不協和音
Heavenly Discord
Tenkai ni Narihibiku Fukyouwaon
episode.summary: - We cannot let that happen again. - Holy Magistrate Keter—the one who leads the heavens under the Almighty`s will—tells Uriel of Lucifer`s planned rebellion. Initially in disbelief, Uriel then learns that the accusations against Lucifer may be connected to an event that once threatened to shatter the heavens... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 崩れゆく友情
A Splintering Friendship
Kuzureyuku Yuujou
episode.summary: - I believed in you... and yet! - Uriel is shocked as she discovers the Orb that Lucifer has been hiding. Lucifer gives her no time to ask questions—quickly engaging Uriel in battle. To protect the heavens, Uriel reaches for a blade in the face of her hostile friend... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 我輩はキングクロッチ!
Behold, I Am King Grouch!
Wagahai wa King Grouch!
episode.summary: - All hail King Grouch! - After many moons, Castle Grouch is finally completed. The king and his subjects are overjoyed until Lucifer`s craft plummets from the skies above... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 反逆の堕天使
The Underworld Rebel
Hangyaku no Datenshi
episode.summary: - I rule the Fallen! - The end has finally come as Lucifer and Uriel work together to challenge the mighty Keter. Will Lucifer be able to save the Heavens...? Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: ルシファーVSウリエル
Lucifer vs Uriel
Lucifer vs Uriel
episode.summary: -We could have saved you... - They were as close as sisters once, but now Lucifer and Uriel face off as two unwavering worldviews collide. In an explosive flurry of blades, their faith, honor, and friendship are put to the test... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: それぞれの覚悟
No Turning Back
Sorezore no Kakugo
episode.summary: -Let`s end this. - As Lucifer`s incursion upon the heavens approaches, Raphael stands to oppose her. Meanwhile, Michael and Gabriel have discovered Lucifer`s true intentions and race to the heavens to prevent the unthinkable... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 激突する想い
Clashing Ideals
Gekitotsu Suru Omoi
episode.summary: - There`s nowhere to run. - Gabriel finds Lucifer at the Falls of Rejuvenation and requests the suspected traitor`s surrender... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 禁断の箱
The Forbidden Box
Kindan no Hako
episode.summary: - I`ll help you find your friends! - After breaking the seal on a forbidden chest housing a thousand calamities, Pandora struggles to gather the escaped disasters for the sake of the last Despair Imp left in the chest... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: ルシファーの行方
Seeking Lucifer
Lucifer no Yukue
episode.summary: - Leave it to us! Eyes open, lips sealed! - Unseen forces have dispatched two mysterious individuals to acertain Lucifer`s whereabouts. Meanwhile, Uriel awakens to a world scarred from the battle prior. Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 能力奪還大作戦
Reclaiming Strength
Nouryoku Dakkan Daisakusen
episode.summary: - Who are those two, anyway? - Uriel and the others have had their powers taken from them by the mysterious archangels Sandalphon and Metatron. The four of them devise a plan to take back what was stolen from them... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 無限大の友情パワー
The Infinite Power of Friendship
Mugendai no Yuujou Power
episode.summary: - Our friendship is also limitless! - Uriel and Gabriel make battle with the twins Metatron and Sandalphon. Neither side relents, but Gabriel and company begin to feel the pinch as their opponents grow in power... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: アーサー王の帰還
Arthur Returns
Arthur-ou no Kikan
episode.summary: - People of Britannia! I`ve returned! - At long last, Arthur returns to her home kingdom of Britannia. But when she steps foot into her beloved Camelot, she finds calamity has befallen her people... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 消えたランスロット
Lancelot the Lost
Kieta Lancelot
episode.summary: - I`ll go to protect our land and its people. - Arthur, Merlin, and Hamsel embark upon their journey to save the people of Britannia. They arrive in Lancelot`s domain, but what they find is not what they expect... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 歪んだ信頼
Faith Corrupted
Yuganda Shinrai
episode.summary: - You are not fit to rule! - Lancelot attacks Arthur without warning. What will Arthur do when faced against a trusted friend and Knight of the Round Table...? Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: マーリン危うし
Merlin in Peril
Merlin Ayaushi
episode.summary: - Lend me your power once more! - Lancelot, Arthur, and company make their way through a labyrinthine forest. When Merlin gets separated from the group, however... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: ブリタニアを導く光
Britannia`s Guiding Light
Britannia o Michibiku Hikari
episode.summary: - So long as my comrades are with me, I`ll never accept defeat! - The terrible Beast of Badon Hill has shown its true form to Arthur and the others. Can Arthur defeat the monster and restore hope to the people of Britannia...? Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 堕天使ルシファー, 始動!
Rise of the Fallen Angel
Datenshi Lucifer, Shidou!
episode.summary: - Life has become such a bore. - The fallen Lucifer attempts to infiltrate a prison fortress housing the most heinous of felons. Her plan is a mystery, but one thing is certain: her insurrection has only just begun...! Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: ベルゼブブの思惑
Beelzebub`s Verdict
Beelzebub no Omowaku
episode.summary: - Life has become such a bore. - Binah reveals to Uriel and company the horrifying evil which the Hallowed Decemviri plot. Meanwhile, Beelzebub tells Lucifer and Xaphan that destroying Surgat—the ancient weapon they seek—is impossible. Lucifer, however, is unfazed... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 突入! アビスインフェルノ
Into the Infernal Abyss
Totsunyuu! Abyss Inferno
episode.summary: -Life has become such a bore. - Lucifer and company have reached the Underworld. The place Beelzebub brings them to is a graveyard: a swirling whirlpool of despair, regret, and malice. Lucifer and Xaphan enter the fray in search of the device to control Surgat, but... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: ルシファー -反逆の堕天使- 総集編
Episode S2
Lucifer: Hangyaku no Datenshi - Soushuuhen
襲い来る天聖達
The Decemviri Strike
Osoi Kuru Tensei-tachi
episode.summary: - We`ll stop the enemy, no matter the cost. - In the Heavens, Uriel and the archangels strengthen their defenses to protect the final shrine. Meanwhile in the Underworld, Chokhmah succeeds in reviving Surgat. Will Lucifer and company be able to thwart the Decemviri`s heinous plans...?! Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: ゼフォン怒りの反撃
Xaphan`s Counterattack
Xaphan Ikari no Hangeki
episode.summary: I promise I will avenge the Almighty. Surgat`s Lightning of Destruction has felled the Tree of Life. Xaphan, downtrodden and enraged at her failure to protect the Almighty, confronts Chokhmah alone... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: スルガトの暴走
The Wrath of Surgat
Surgat no Bousou
episode.summary: - Burn it all to ash! - An enraged Xaphan uses Surgat to capture Chokhmah. When she attempts to finally exact vengeance, however... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 未来を賭けた決断
Fate in the Balance
Mirai o Kaketa Ketsudan
episode.summary: -Plans change.- Unleashed and out of control, Surgat begins a storm of destruction. In a desperate attempt to prevent calamity, Lucifer and Xaphan risk it all... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 目覚めし王女
The Princess Awakens
Mezameshi Oujo
episode.summary: - Don`t worry. I`ll keep everyone safe! - In the land of Lecillia, two young women compete for their country`s throne. Solomon, descendant of Lecillia`s first king, and Levy, daughter to the second king. Longing to preserve peace and joy among her people, Solomon commits to her studies day after day, yet her efforts always seem in vain. One night, however, she has a mysterious dream... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: ソロモンの想い
Solomon`s Wish
Solomon no Omoi
episode.summary: - I succeeded in my first summoning! - Solomon summons the demon Forneus, the Great Marquis of the Netherworld, and Cassiel, the Angel of Tears and Solitude. While she rejoices over the success of her ritual, Forneus is less than pleased... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 衝突する王女たち
Royal Conflict
Shoutotsu Suru Oujo-tachi
episode.summary: - Don`t undo the seal! You can`t! - When the royal alarm is raised, Solomon rushes to investigate—the palace vault has been infiltrated. The culprit turns out to be none other than Levy herself. Solomon tries to stop her, but... Source: Official Youtube

episode.title: 狙われたオーブ
Eyes on the Orb
Nerawareta Orb
episode.summary: - I warned you, didn`t I? - As Solomon and Levy face off within the vault, Balt arrives and begins to reprimand them. Things escalate when Forneus appears and the devastating truth is revealed... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 天使の救いと悪魔の導き
Angelic Grace, Demonic Counsel
Tenshi no Sukui to Akuma no Michibiki
episode.summary: - I`ll go to the ends of the world to keep my people safe. - Balt places a curse over all of Lecillia, then disappears along with the Orb. Solomon and Levy both work in their own ways to lift the curse, but... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 瞳に映る魔の手
Dark Machinations
Hitomi ni Utsuru Ma no Te
episode.summary: - Those saps are goners. - With Forneus and Cassiel, Solomon seeks out Balt to save her people. Along the way, however, Forneus senses that Lecillia is in danger... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 譲れない想い
Unwavering Resolve
Yuzurenai Omoi
episode.summary: - I`ll protect everyone! - Solomon and Levy have successfully held off the Great Sands` invasion on Lecillia. But an even greater threat draws near... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 決意と涙
Conviction and Tears
Ketsui to Namida
episode.summary: - I`ll protect Lecillia my way. - Solomon has been taken captive by the Scyzari Empire. The guilt of endangering Lecillia weighs heavily on Levy`s heart. What does fate have in store for these two daughters of Lecillia... Source: Official YouTube

episode.title: 受け継がれる意志
Passing of the Torch
Uketsugareru Ishi
episode.summary: - Promise me that you will protect the smiles of the people. - Many moons ago, Malkuth, newly-risen emperor of Scyzari, called for an audience with the First King of Lecillia. Not even the king, however, could have imaged Malkuth`s dreadful intentions, or the harrowing events that young Solomon would witness... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 失意をこえて
Rising Above
Shitsui o Koete
episode.summary: - If it would save my people... my life`s a small price to pay! - Solomon resolves to save her people, even if it means giving up her life. Meanwhile, Balt attempts to access the forbidden book of demons... Source: Youtube

episode.title: 覚醒の時
Awakening
Kakusei no Toki
episode.summary: - The light of Lecillia will not be snuffed out... - Levy stands face-to-face with her father`s murderer, Malkuth. Does her ice magic stand a chance against this mighty foe? Source: YouTube

episode.title: 支配する者
Transcendence
Shihai Suru Mono
episode.summary: - I won`t let you get away with this! - Solomon`s newly-awakened power summons forth Forneus` true form. In a grand display of his power, the Great Marquis of the Netherworld tries to stop Malkuth, however... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 心を一つに
One in Heart and Mind
Kokoro o Hitotsu ni
episode.summary: - I`m not alone. - Solomon and Levy finally unite to protect their beloved people. The final battle against the now almighty Malkuth is at hand... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 奪われた光
Stolen Light
Ubawareta Hikari
episode.summary: - So long as I hold Excalibur, Britannia will never fall! - Arthur`s nation of Britannia holds a festival to honor her sacred sword Excalibur, but the festivities are interrupted suddenly by strange music coming from the skies... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 俺たちゃ鮫肌海賊団
The Scaly-Skin Pirates
Oretacha Samehada Kaizokudan
episode.summary: - Is this how you treat your comrades?! - Arthur awakens on the deck of a pirate ship after being spirited away from danger by the Knights of the Round Table. To return to Britannia, she attempts to prove that she is its ruler... Source: YouTube

episode.title: ぺリノアはかく語りき
Thus Spoke Pellinore
Pellinore wa Kaku Katariki
episode.summary: - Fine by me, Arthur. Drinks are on you. - Arthur travels to Northumberland in search of Caliburn, which she believes will help her defeat Tiphereth. She hears a commotion when searching for her mentor, to whom she entrusted the blade... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 選ばれし者
The Chosen
Erabareshimono
episode.summary: - I became Britannia`s rightful ruler when I first drew Caliburn. - Arthur learns of Caliburn`s location from the owner of a pawn shop and is guided towards the sword. She finds herself in an eerie place littered with blades... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 魅せられし者
The Beguiled
Miserareshi Mono
episode.summary: - Then die where you stand. - Arthur faces her fellow pupil Arawin in battle, but something inside him has changed after all these years. What can Arthur do to stand against his bloodlust and magic blade...?! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 戦士たちの逆襲
The Knights Strike Back
Senshi-tachi no Gyakushuu
episode.summary: - I can`t maintain this form! - The fearsome Decemvir Tiphereth would even block out the sun with a disco ball in the name of beauty. Arthur`s group returns to Britannia, but can they save her neon-coated friends and people...? Source: YouTube

episode.title: 輝ける世界
A Radiant World
Kagayakeru Sekai
episode.summary: -Our spirits are one, now and forever!- Arthur confronts Tiphereth`s true form. With her country and life on the line, she stands firm in a heated battle against the Decemvir`s enhanced strength. Who will come out on top of their intense battle...? Source: YouTube

episode.title: 滅びゆく世界
A Dying World
Horibi Yuku Sekai
episode.summary: - We`ll all escape this planet together. - On a world where nearly all life has been wiped out, a young man named Noah gathers Orb Fragments to power his ark, dreaming of one day escaping the planet with its surviving animals. One day, some strange life forms fall from the sky! Who—or what—could they be...?! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 最初の仲間
My First Friends
Saisho no Nakama
episode.summary: - You... don`t have any friends, do you? - After setting off in search of a giant Orb, Noah and the others are attacked by a strange creature called an Adaptor. The group manages to defeat the beast and later spends the night in a deserted town. There Noah reveals the origins of his mechanical body, just before they face a terrible new foe...! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 約束の果て
Pact`s Conclusion
Yakusoku no Hate
episode.summary: - We made a deal! A pinky swear! - Noah`s group discovers an enormous Orb, but it`s deep inside an Adaptor nest! Chesed makes a pinky swear with Noah before going off on his own to collect the Orb`s energy. However... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 裏切りの方舟
Ark of Treachery
Uragiri no Hakobune
episode.summary: - I promised that we`d leave this planet together! - "I`ll be taking your ark!" proclaims Chesed as he vanishes. Opeco raises her suspicions, but Noah chooses to trust Chesed. Noah clings to this belief as he continues his fight, even as the adaptors grow in number and the cave begins to collapse... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 命より大切なもの
Worth Dying For
Inochi yori Taisetsu na Mono
episode.summary: -Why are you taking this so far?!- The ark finally takes off! Chesed wants to hurry and escape the planet, but Noah`s wish to bring the animals with them slows them down. And what`s more, a gargantuan Adaptor attacks, preventing their escape. Noah finds himself on the brink, completely unable to move...! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 新たなる旅立ち
A New Journey
Aratanaru Tabidachi
episode.summary: - Show it... what we`re made of. - The Adaptor finally shows its true form to Noah, whose life has been saved by Chesed. Noah makes his final stand to save the animals and his friends from the unimaginably massive Adaptor...! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 蘇りしモノ
Revenant
Yomigaerishi Mono
episode.summary: - I love yooou! Lucifeeer! - His pure hatred for Lucifer is enough to bring the wicked Decimvir Keter back into this world. However, his scorn changes to twisted feelings of love! In a recovering Heaven, Keter forces Uriel and the other Archangels into a diabolical game...! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 疑心暗鬼
Shadow of Doubt
Gishin`anki
episode.summary: - If only Lucifer were here right now... - To save the Heavens, Lucifer meets the Eleventh Decemvir, Da`at, whose strength is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Keter`s Challenge begins to weigh upon the bonds between the Archangels... Source: YouTube

episode.title: うちらの絆
The Ties That Bind
Uchira no Kizuna
episode.summary: - Don`t underestimate our bonds!- The Mirror of Truth, whose power could have revealed Keter, has been shattered, and Michael`s suspicions turn to Ramiel. Believing in the bond they`ve forged through the countless battles they braved together, Camael protects Ramiel, but loss has pushed Michael beyond reason... Source: YouTube

episode.title: 欺きの姉妹
Deceptive Sisters
Azamuki no Shimai
episode.summary: - Can we end this game, already? - The twins Metatron and Sandalphon have absolute faith in one another, so they deduce that Keter must be inside either Michael or Gabriel. Showing no mercy, they attack! All the while, Lucifer is still unable to overcome the challenges of her training. Will the Heavens be left to the mercy of Keter...?! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 最後の二人
Then There Were Two
Saigo no Futari
episode.summary: - Friendship is so beautiful, and so foolish! - The climax of Keter`s Challenge has finally arrived! Has Keter been in Michael all along?! Or is Gabriel the impostor?! Neither side will yield, and a heated battle unfolds. Seeing the terrible fate that has befallen her former comrades, Lucifer forcibly ends the Trial of Light and races toward the Heavens...! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 契りのキス
Covenant`s Kiss
Chigiri no Kiss
episode.summary: -Let me feel more of who you are! - Lucifer, enraged by seeing her friends turned to stone, finally confronts Keter and his twisted affections! With the strength she`s gained from her training, Lucifer unleashes a torrent of blows on the Decemvir, but...! Source: YouTube

episode.title: そして鐘が鳴る
And the Bell Tolls
Soshite Kane ga Naru
episode.summary: -Let there be light. - Though her training was left unfinished, Lucifer`s bond with her friends brings about a miracle! With the battle between Lucifer and the revived Keter nearing its end, what will become of the petrified angels...?! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 集いしヒーローたち
Heroes United
Tsudoishi Hero-tachi
episode.summary: - Playing knight with that toy on your belt? - Lucifer, Arthur, Solomon, Noah, and Pandora meet in the Heavens to save Strike World! However, Lucifer refuses to join them. As the battle against the evil Decemviri unfolds, will the divided heroes stand a chance...? Source: YouTube

episode.title: 破滅の門
Gate of Ruin
Hametsu no Mon
episode.summary: - I was told to bring you back with me. - The Heroes make their move after they find out that Caesar has taken her to the enemy`s base of operations. Why did the evil Decemviri Yesod call for her? And what does he have in store for her...?! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 愛ゆえに
In Love`s Name
Ai Yue ni
episode.summary: - Just stay alive! - The Heroes arrive at the Death Gate on Noah`s ark, only to be caught in a trap! Lucifer flies off on her own, while Yesod and Binah`s shocking past comes to light. Source: YouTube

episode.title: なすべきこと
What Must Be Done
Nasubeki Koto
episode.summary: - Worry about yourself! - As Lucifer is being overwhelmed by Yesod, Arthur arrives to turn the tides! Can their teamwork triumph over the Decemvir`s incredible strength?! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 旗はひるがえる
Raise the Banner
Hata wa Hirugaeru
episode.summary: - I am no longer afraid. - After losing his beloved Binah, Yesod activates the Death Gate to destroy Strike World. There`s no time to waste! Can Lucifer and the others stop the Death Gate before it`s too late...?! Source: YouTube

episode.title: 光の絆
Light`s Bonds
Hikari no Kizuna
episode.summary: - The light of our worlds will never fade! - Supported by Binah`s newly awakened powers, the Heroes begin their climactic battle with Yesod! The fate of Strike World hangs in the balance! Source: YouTube
